collectible.title: Damaged plush
collectible.subtitle: Visage of Evil
collectible.text: A terribly mangled plush toy depicting an inditerminable creature of villainous origin, though it's cutesy appearance betrays it's creator's ability to portray such a thing. Someone, or something, seems to have relished in rending it's squishy body on multiple occassions, before sloppily stitching the beast's wounds shut. Despite their best efforts, however, the plush was dealt a fatal, irreperable blow as the damage won out, spilling the toy's fluffed guts to the open air. "What to do? She vowed to love everything in the world, but all that's left was a collapsing heart. "
collectible.unlock: Win a game againt The Queen of Hatred where she has won at least 16 rounds.
